widget.name: [The Mega Owchies Mobile App]
widget.description:
You've watched the movie. Now, you can play the game... on MOBILE DEVICES! From the creators of everything you like comes a very emotional (and funny) app about a boy and his dog. Based on Mega Owchies The Movie on YouTube, Justin adopts a dog only to have him taken by Dr. Dance Party (that was my character in the movie). Justin must travel through 5 worlds, each with its own lit soundtrack, to find man's best friend:
-Grasslands (Morning) -Grasslands (Afternoon) -Grasslands (Evening) -ShopMart -HeartBurn World / Dr. Dance Party's Evil Secret Lair
The Mega Owchies Video Game has been modified for mobile use, including:
-Arrow buttons replace arrow keys -All music is now Non-Copyright -All music is 29 seconds or less -All art has been converted to Bitmap -No more World Records (Sorry)
Features: -Play as Justin and run, jump, climb, and bounce your way to victory -Cut scenes!!! -A lit soundtrack, none of which is copyrighted (4 realz this time) -5 worlds and 3 boss levels based on Mega Owchies The Movie -Self Destruct Sequence!
